Our Training Programs

Choose from our comprehensive range of football training programs designed to develop players of all ages and skill levels.

Youth Development Program

$299

Comprehensive training for young players aged 6-12 focusing on fundamental skills, teamwork, and love for the game.

Age Group:6-12 years
Duration:12 weeks

Key Features:

  • Ball control
  • Passing techniques
  • Team coordination
  • Fitness training
Learn More

Elite Academy Program

$499

Advanced training for competitive players aged 13-18 preparing for college and professional opportunities.

Age Group:13-18 years
Duration:16 weeks

Key Features:

  • Advanced tactics
  • Position-specific training
  • College recruitment prep
  • Video analysis
Learn More

Goalkeeper Academy

$399

Specialized training for goalkeepers focusing on technique, positioning, and mental preparation.

Age Group:10-18 years
Duration:10 weeks

Key Features:

  • Shot stopping
  • Positioning
  • Distribution
  • Communication skills
Learn More
View All Programs

Why Choose Screensport FC?

We provide comprehensive football development with professional coaching, modern facilities, and a proven track record of player success.

Professional Coaching

Learn from UEFA licensed coaches with professional playing and coaching experience.

State-of-the-Art Facilities

Train on professional-grade pitches with modern equipment and analysis technology.

Age-Appropriate Training

Programs designed specifically for different age groups and skill levels.

College Recruitment Support

Assistance with college applications, scholarship opportunities, and showcase events.

Video Analysis

Modern video analysis tools to review performance and track improvement.

Competitive Matches

Regular competitive matches and tournaments against other academies.
